be onto a good thing.translation[0].defi: to have found an easy way of being successful or getting what you want
Andrew knew when he was onto a good thing.
be onto a good thing.translation[1].defi: if you are onto a good thing, you are in a situation that is very helpful, comfortable, or profitable for you
Directors who take dividends instead of salary may think they are onto a good thing but could have problems on retirement.
think/know you are onto a good thing
